MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L32 postcode area of Kirkby, affecting properties in Park Road. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.29am. Repairs to the mains underground cable are taking longer than expected because of extend of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.40am on 30th of Jan 2021.
